column1: short outside off stump, he gets up on his toes and back foot drives to cover-point
129kph, good length, hint of shape back, he defends in a compact position from the crease
125kph, back of a length wide of off, cross seam delivery, he punches firmly off the back foot straight to cover
123kph, good length fourth stump, he's caught on the crease, with an angled bat, chops an inside edge between his legs into the leg side for a single
125kph, angled into the pad and he clips this behind square with incredible timing! Just a little flick off the hip wide of fine leg and it raced to the rope. He is in some touch
127kph, fuller outside off, he drives on the rise, timing it well but Shakib makes a very good diving stop at cover-point
131kph, full and shaping away from the left hander who leaves
just a neat back foot punch through point! He just blocked this. It was short of a length outside off and he bunted it and it flew to the rope through point
135kph, back of a length, some bounce outside off, and he leaves late
132kph, short of a length, climbing, he's up on his toes defending to cover
137kph, back of a length, nipping in, strikes him on the thigh pad
132kph, short and wide, asked to hit and he cuts it straight to point. Missed out there
127kph, short of a length outside off, he stands up and punches back to the bowler
125kph, back of a length, top of off, he defends firmly off the back foot
good length, fourth stump line, he's half forward pushing this wide of mid on for a single
124kph, short of a length angled in, he's cramped trying to pull and can't beat the man in the ring at forward square
112kph, slower ball on off, he sits back and works this with his wrists to square leg
116kph, slower ball cutter, it grips and takes him on the thigh pad, rolling to midwicket for a leg bye
139kph, fuller length, angled across, no shape back, Finch wisely leaves
135kph, back of a length down leg, he tries to glance but misses and it's called wide
137kph, full on the pads, he glances this easily away to fine leg
136kph, full outside off, hint of shape away, he pushes on the move off the outside half of the bat to backward point
139kph, good length, angling in, he's defending from the crease to midwicket
139kph, but straying down leg and he tickles this fine to silence the crowd! Easy pickings. Too straight
short and wide, he's back and thumping a cut to cover-point but can't beat Shakib on the circle
launched over cover! This was floated up outside off and Finch climbed in, opening up the hips and slicing this up and over cover! That is a superb stroke
good length, fourth stump line, he defends from the crease to cover
126kph, back of a length on middle, he is back and whipping this to the deep square that is in place
127kph, good length outside off, he defends half forward to cover-point
back of a length, 114kph slower ball, stays a touch low and Warner punches off the toe of the bat to mid off

dropped at backward point! This was short and wide, he went back and cut it the air and the man at backward point didn't pick it up. He got both hands to it low to his right but it burst through. Sabbir the man. He didn't pick it up out of the crowd
141kph, good length angled across he hangs the bat out and it runs off the thick outside edge to third man
back of a length, nipping into the thigh pad and it goes behind square for a leg bye
137kph, half volley, but Finch hangs back and doesn't move his feet, plays a back foot drive wide of mid off for a single
135kph, short ball, lifting over off, Warner sways back a touch and lets it fly past his chest
137kph, full into leg stump, he glances this with the angle to fine leg
play and miss, a waft outside off at a 136kph length ball angled across. Not a good shot.
thick inside edge to short fine. Wasn't far from leg stump. That was 125kph, angled in, the bat was angled a touch defending from the crease but the inside edge was thick enough
fuller, angled into off, he defends half forward to midwicket
126kph, back of a length, he tries to pull but chops it off the bottom edge onto pad
punches off the back foot wide of mid off! Nothing wrong there. A lovely flow of the bat as it sat up from back of a length and he placed it perfectly
short and wide, again he cracks a cut straight to cover-point. That's the third time he's done that
short slower ball, 114kph, he waits and plays a controlled pull behind square, he wants two but Shakib is quick to the ball in the deep
full on middle, he plays a very nice drive straight of mid off but Rubel makes a superb diving save on the circle. Saved three runs
135kph, full outside off, he sits back and plays a back foot drive but picks out cover
124kph, slower ball outside off, he sits back and mistimes a back foot drive to mid off on the circle who is deep. Easy one
hooked over square leg! 134kph good bouncer, but he picked the length quicker this time, swivelled and smashed it flat over square into the crowd! That was crunched.
full slower ball, 126kph, he drives very nicely but straight to mid off
a cracking bouncer, a different angle, Warner drops to his knee to sway under it
109kph slower ball floated outside off, Finch tries to hit this out of the ground, he drags it along the ground off the toe of the bat through midwicket for two
116kph, slower ball on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
slower ball, good length, he defends on the front foot
115kph, slower ball, good length, he pushes this on the front foot to cover
good length, slower ball outside off, he pushes on the rise to cover
114kph, slower ball, he drives back past the bowler who gets a hand on it, it rolls slowly to mid off for an easy one
tossed up outside off, he sits back and cuts straight to cover-point
lovely length, not much turn, he defends from the crease
thumped down the ground! too full, over-pitched, he drives with power from the crease along the ground straight of mid off
shorter length, he punches off the back foot wide of long off, they push for two but it's not on
looped up, 87kph, he pushes on the front foot wide of mid off for one
drifting into middle, he drives, mistiming this to mid off
short and wide, he cuts firmly to deep cover-point
114kph, slower ball, on leg, he tucks this behind square
back of a length on off, he defends off the back foot
120kph, back of a length on off, he turns this behind square with control
126kph, back of a length angled in, he sits back and punches straight to cover
114kph, angled down leg and Finch just glances this fine for four! Bad ball and easy pickings for Finch
flatter on off, he defends from the crease
tossed up, he skips down and drives neatly to long on
round arm, drifting in, he mistimes a drive trying to go through the off side, drags it straight of midwicket to long on
shorter outside off, he punches this and threads it between cover and mid off, Sabbir has a long chase and does well to haul it in
skips down early, it's darted in, he stands up and punches down to long on
tossed up on middle, he drives easily to long on
134kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he cuts off the back foot straight to backward point
135kph, back of a length wide of off, he cuts off the back foot to deep point
136kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he stays leg side and drives off the back foot, opening the face to get it to deep cover-point
136kph, short ball, and he pulls to midwicket but Soumya misfields, it's a long chase for Shakib but he cuts it off
138kph, good length angled across, he flashes and misses. There's a huge roar from the crowd but no edge. He pinned the ears back there
full wide half volley, hint of tail away, he plays a strong square drive but straight to the sweeper at deep cover-point
full toss and he skips out and drives beautifully inside out past cover! Very good placement. He didn't try and over hit it, just used his feet to get there on the full and placed it well
Bang! Slog sweep way back over midwicket! Now he's going. That was in the slot, he got down on one knee and launched it 94m with the turn. Huge hit
shorter length, he's back and punching straight to cover
slight leading edge, closing the face trying to work to leg
clips this straight to midwicket
slower on leg, he sits back and works this deftly into the gap at square leg
141kph, back of a length, leg stump, takes him on the thigh pad trying to work it behind square
back of a length, 128kph, cutter, he punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
full angled into off, he drives firmly back to the bowler
136kph, back of a length, on off, he's back and working this wide of midwicket
135kph, good length on leg, he defends on the front foot to midwicket
short into the ribs, 136kph, he's back and pulling this neatly to fine leg. Fourth time Warner has reached 50 in the World Cup.
drifting way down the leg side and called
drifting a long way into leg, no turn, he's back and knocking this to square leg
tossed up on off, he drives straight back to the bowler
flatter on off, he's back and punching back to the bowler
slog sweep over square! Just lobbed into his arc on leg, he was down on one knee and lifting this up over square leg into the crowd!

Huge hit that goes too high to clear the rope into the wind at deep midwicket! It half volleyed into the rope. Anywhere else on the ground it was six. Again tossed up in the arc and he just launched it but hit it too high
flatter outside off, he punches off the back foot to point
138kph, full on off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot to backward point
back of a length, 139kph, on the hip, he's back quickly and tucking this behind square, into the big gap and they run two to bring up the century stand
136kph, rears off a length and hits him flush on the glove! Wow that climbed. He has broken that bottom left thumb before like that
short into the ribs, he pulls through square leg, he didn't time it
length ball on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler off the back foot

length ball on the stumps, Warner comes down the track and looks to work it towards mid-on, misses and is rapped on the pads. A big appeal for lbw but given not out. Was probably going down with the drift
length ball around off, pushes it towards covers
length ball on the stumps, Warner goes back and forces it towards long-on
length again, spinning into Finch who gives himself some room and eases it towards long-on for a walking single
length around off, flatter at 91kph, Warner defends it from the front foot, bat and pad close
length around off, a bit of room this time, punched through covers off the back foot
short of length on middle and leg, goes for the pull and misses, struck on the thigh
length ball around middle and off, Warner stays leg side of the ball and taps it towards cover
short of length on the stumps, a bit of extra bounce, Warner adjusts well to pull it towards fine leg, rolling his wrists over
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards the left of the mid-off
down the leg side, Warner goes for the pull but too wide to connect
short of length but once again drifting down the leg side, another wide
better from Rubel, similar length but this time into the body, Warner is cramped is he looks to swat it away
length ball around middle and off, Warner dabs it towards covers, a bit of fumble there allows an extra run
length ball around off, flatter in trajectory, Finch waits on the back foot and guides towards point
backs away to the fuller delivery and looks to go aerial, mistimed towards wide long-on for a couple
flatter on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler this time
down the leg side and Finch manages to get some bat on it, and that's another fifty for Australia captain. his eighth in last 11 innings
fuller on the stumps and pushed towards long-on
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it back towards the bowler
starts with a gentle one, a touch fuller around off, Finch comes forward and drives it towards extra cover
length ball but on the stumps this time, driven towards long-on for an easy single
a slower one but fuller around off, Warner drives it past extra cover but sweeper comes across to keep it to two
fuller and wider, Warner reaches out for it and steers it towards sweeper cover

against the run of play, Soumya strikes in his first over. Was a length ball around off, Finch was looking to run it down but is surprised by the extra bounce. He checks his shot but ends up hitting it straight into the hands of short third man. Bangladesh have a breakthrough finally
fuller around off, Khawaja comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
length ball around off and angling in with the arm, pushes it towards mid-off
fuller around off, turns it towards short midwicket
length ball around off, taps it towards long-on to get off the mark
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it back towards the bowler
fuller again, Warner gives himself some room and drives but once again straight towards Mehidy
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it away but cannot beat extra cover
length around off and middle, pushes it towards mid-off
length around off, comes forward and pushes it towards point, another dot
a touch fuller and wider, Khawaja looks to drive it through covers but the ball comes slower off the wicket and takes the inner half of the bat
pitched up around off, driven off the front foot but straight towards mid-off
a huge shout for lbw but probably pitched outside leg. Was an offcutter on a length, Khawaja was moving across and looks to glance, misses. Gets a leg bye though
length ball around off, punches towards the right of mid-off from the back foot
length ball around off, punched off the back foot towards deep point, sprints back for the second, no one better than in world cricket probably than Warner in spotting twos
uses his feet this time to drive it towards long-on
length ball around off, stays back and pushes it towards extra cover
fuller this time, around off and Khawaja drives it towards deep extra cover, comes back for the second
a bit of hesitation but done safely in the end, length ball on middle and angling in, pushes it past short midwicket
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep point
length ball outside off, Warner cuts it hard but a diving stop at backward point diving to his left
back of length around off, pushes it gently towards mid-off
back of length and angling across, Warner once again stays back, punches it towards covers for a quick single
length ball around off, drives it through covers for a couple of runs more
short of length on middle and leg, Khawaja pulls it stylishly behind square leg, focusing on the placement than power and gets a four
length ball around off, pushes it towards covers
length ball at the batsman, 91 kph, Warner goes back and cuts but straight towards the bowler
fuller around off and middle, drives it towards wide long-off for one

a mix-up there as Warner was ball-watching for a moment, but realises soon that he has to sprint, a fumble by Sabbir Rahman at mid-on helps as well. Was a fuller delivery that Kahwaja pushed down the track while coming down the track
flatter around off, punched off the back foot towards covers
works this fuller delivery towards long-off for one
length ball around off, pushes it towards mid-off for one
slower one on middle and leg, Warner opens the face of the bat to work it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards midwicket
length ball around middle, pushes it towards mid-on
length ball outside off, comes forward and drives it on the up towards long-off
another offcutter on the pads, flicked towards midwicket, Warner was looking for the second initially but decides against it as the fielder charges towards the ball
flatter on middle and leg, turns it towards short midwicket
fuller around off, digs it out towards the right of long-off
fuller around off, drives it towards long-off for another single
fuller on middle and leg, drives it inside out towards long-off and picks up another single
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
length ball angling on the pads, Warner goes for the flick but cannot beat short fine leg
length ball around off, drives it on the up towards deep extra cover
fuller around off, in the slot for Warner who clears his front leg and lofts it over extra cover and moves into 80s
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards long-on to keep the scoreboard ticking
fuller around off, drives it on the move towards long-off
short of length outside off, enough room for Warner to rock back and cut it past the point fielder, beats the sweeper cover as well. Surely, this has to be the last over for Soumya
cutter on middle and leg, pulls it towards backward square leg and keeps the strike
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and pushes it towards long-off
length ball around off, drives i square off the wicket, deep point cuts it off
length ball on the stumps, backs away and opens the face of the bat to work it towards deep point
fuller around off, pushes it towards extra cover from the crease

fuller around off, looks to smash it away but the ball is not coming on to the bat easily, ends up hitting on to his shoe. Was looking for a single as the ball rolled towards cover-point but Warner wisely sends him back
flatter and quicker around off, Khawaja was on the back foot, does well to get his bat down in time
short of length on the stumps, goes down and pulls it towards deep backward square leg
flatter outside off, goes for the reverse sweep but ends up hitting it low on to the keeper's pad
another reverse sweep, this time gets it behind point for a couple
short of length around off, goes back and punches it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
fuller down the leg side, goes for the sweep and gets it fine, beating the man at short fine leg
short of length outside off, rocks back and cuts it towards short third man, Mustafizur puts in the dive but cannot prevent the boundary
fuller around off, uses his feet but pings it straight towards extra cover
flatter, angling in towards the batsman who backs away and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the stumps, drives it towards sweeper cover
moves to 99 with that three, was fuller and he drives it towards deep extra cover
fuller around off, drives but cannot get it past mid-off
fuller on the pads, tucked away towards short midwicket

a touch shorter, Warner gets back and works it behind square and gets to his 16th ODI hundred, the second of this World Cup. Yes, he started slowly but it's not an easy wicket and since he's set, he can accelerate
fuller around off, reverse sweeps it towards short third man for a quick single
length ball on the stumps, taps it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, uses his feet to drive it towards long-on
dragged short this time, Khawaja goes back and pulls it towards deep square leg
fuller around off, and driven firmly towards sweeper cover, the deep point fielder cuts it off
length ball on the stumps, works it towards long-on
length around off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep midwicket
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep backward point
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards sweeper cover
length ball on the stumps, was looking to turn it on the leg side, gets a leading edge that beats extra cover
length ball around off and middle, but Warner finds point with the cut
short of length this time and with Mashrafe's pace, Warner had enough time to rock back and pull it over midwicket for four
slower one this time, fuller on the stumps, drives it towards midwicket for a quick single
another short one from Mashrafe, outside off, Khawaja picks it up and pulls it towards that vacant deep midwicket area
length ball around off, Khawaja uses his wrists to turn it towards backward square leg
length ball on the pads, hurries on to the batsman but Khawaja works it towards fine leg for one
short of length outside off, chops it towards mid-off for one
short of length once again, Khawaja swivels to pull it towards deep square leg
length ball on middle and leg, no room for Warner there, tucked away towards short midwicket
short of length, hitting the Warner in the box off an inside edge as he goes for the pull, he's down but all looks well. Ready to face the next ball
length ball on the stumps, driven down the ground for a single
123kph, slower ball wide of off, he cuts, mistiming wide of cover to the sweeper
133kph, full outside off, he drives flowingly on the up but cover makes a good stop
glorious cover drive races to the sweeper in the deep. He hit too well. Hit it too square
131kph, full angled down leg, it comes off pad and rolls for a leg bye
short ball, he stands up and cracks a pull shot, rolling the wrists to get it to deep midwicket
122kph, short ball on off, he's cramped, staying leg side he slaps this off the back foot over cover for a couple. Inventive but he couldn't get it straight enough to find the rope
short ball, he hammers a pull shot to the man in the deep, it travels at a warp speed and causes a misfield but it doesn't cost anything
magnificent late cut wide of third man! It was 140kph, short but not that wide, he created some room and late cut it wide of third man and it raced away
he charges a 141kph length, chops it off the bottom edge to backward point
lovely pull shot off the hip! Fractionally short on leg, he lifted the front leg, Brian Lara style and pulled it wide of short fine leg
slower ball back of a length, he works this off the hip behind square. 50 for Khawaja at a run-a-ball. He's played well
138kph, skidding through, he grunts as it stays low and he pulls awkwardly behind square
big swing and miss and it just goes past leg stump! He tried to line this up and launch a length ball straight down the ground but missed
thumped over mid off! Banged in back of a length, he backed away and slapped it flat and just over mid off inside the circle. Hit with amazing power
slower ball bouncer, he tries to cut over point but is cramped and misses, Mushfiqur fumbles behind the stumps on the bounce and they pinch a bye
135kph, full on leg, he stays leg side and drives very nicely but straight to cover
another slower ball bouncer, brilliantly bowled, it followed Khawaja as he tried to pull and he just got out of the way
slower short ball, it sits up, he hammers a pull shot forward of square into the gap for a couple
141kph, slung short down the leg side and called
check drive down the ground the sightscreen! 126kph in the slot and he just checked through the line, picking the slower ball and it went like low golf shot under the wind straight down the ground
on the hip, he works this behind square and sprints two. Great running
short on the hip again, he mistimes a pull behind square to wide fine leg
good length on middle, he works it through midwicket, they look for two but it's not on
slower ball on leg, he bunts this into midwicket
shorter slower ball, he's back and working this through square leg
this was fired down leg, would have been a wide, but Khawaja swept it straight to short fine! A mistake there
low full toss, he clips this wide of long on for a couple
another short ball down leg, again it would have been a wide, he pulls it straight to short fine leg again! Gets one this time
a switch hit up and over short third man! He set up early and it was in the slot outside off, he deliberately lifted it up and over and one bounce four
short ball down leg, he pulls again to short fine leg. This would have been a wide as well
smacked 20 rows back over deep midwicket! This begged to be hit. A drag down short ball on leg, he set his base and clubbed it miles over deep midwicket
low full toss outside off, a bottom edge just gets past the keeper! Attempted wide yorker, he got a thin edge that rolled low and wide of Mushfiqur and third man is up.
clever upper cut! Short slower ball wide of off, Khawaja adjusted well and just lifted it over a vacant slips with no third man back
132kph, thigh high full toss, he whips this behind square and they run well to get two
low full toss whipped forward of square! Another bad ball, Khawaja hit this a touch harder than the last one, timed it well to find the rope
pulled behind square! Fine leg went finer for some reason, this was chest high, he rolled the wrists on a pull and placed it to the rope!
low full toss, he glances this straight to the man at fine leg
123kph, low full toss, he drives down to long on
full toss swiped over deep midwicket! Right in the strike zone and he clubbed it flat over midwicket and got all of it
126kph, yorker on leg, he digs this out to long on. 150 for Warner! His 6th score 150 plus in ODIs
stunning square drive on the up through point! Wasn't a bad ball, slower ball wide of off, he steered it with amazing timing behind point. Class batting
good length on off, he drives inside out to deep cover point
126kph, knee high full toss, he tries to launch over midwicket but miscues, getting it to the man in the deep on the bounce
attempted switch hit to a 139kph, full ball outside leg! It comes off pad for a leg bye
140kph low full toss on leg, he glances this to wide fine leg
lofted flat and wide of long on! An attempted yorker was a half volley on leg stump, it was in the arc and he shovelled it wide of long on
backs away and upper cuts over short third man! Predicted the short ball, gave room and ramped it over short third man
good yorker outside leg, he tried to give room but digs it out through midwicket and sprints two
137kph, full on leg stump, he clips this firmly along the ground to deep midwicket
wide full toss, he reaches out and slaps it through point! He had backed away, it was well wide of off, he reached out at full stretched and cracked it

lobs a catch to short third man! Soumya does it again! 115kph short slower ball, Warner tries to upper cut but there's no pace, he just lobs a catch to the man on the circle and Rubel takes an easy catch.
116kph, length ball on off, he sits back and works this neatly to the gap at midwicket and they call two straight away. Good running
123kph, full and straight, he drives easily down to long on
126kph, low full toss on middle, he steps across his stumps and works it through square leg
wide yorker and he steers it behind point! Good delivery but Maxwell's talent and sublime hands steered it past the fielder at pace and it raced to the rope
over-steps! 138kph low full toss, whipped to midwicket but what a mistake with the front foot
What a shot over mid off! Full and wide of off, he had gone outside off, had to adjust and shovel it off the back foot over mid off and into the rope on the full! That is staggering skill
carved through cover! Wowee! In the slot wide of off, he cleared the front leg and rifled it through cover!
clubbed over square leg! You van't bowl a length slower ball to Maxi. He sat and waited and clubbed it over square leg into the crowd
yorker length, he gives room and steers it to the fielder at cover
launched into the biggest corner of the ground at wide long on, it's a huge hit down there, Tamim makes the diving save on the rope but they run well enough to get three
backs away and slices this through backward point! Elegance, timing, pure class to get a ball from leg stump through backward point. He opened his chest up and the flow of the bat was superb
chest high short ball slapped over deep midwicket! Bad ball at that pace. Maxwell had all the time in the world to set up and hit the pull shot over deep midwicket

a mix up and Maxwell is run out! Full yorker on leg, he got it between his legs to short fine leg and ran, Khawaja started to run and called no! They were both standing mid pitch. Rubel, took his time, fired and hit! Maxwell could not believe Khawaja stopped running!
126kph, short and wide, he late cuts straight to short third man
122kph, full on off, he drives neatly to and conventionally to long off

caught behind! Soumya has been unbelievable! A surprise short ball, it comes off the pitch slowly, he tries to pull but is through the shot, gets a bottom edge off the toe of the bat, and Mushfiqur dives forward to take the catch!
124kph, perfect yorker, tailing in late into leg stump, he just jams it out and gets one

plumb LBW! Smith reviews for the sake of it but it was a full toss that hit him on the shin in front of middle. This is out. No bat. Ball tracking has it hitting the base of middle and off. The review is wasted. He went back and across and tried to whip it behind square and missed it.
135kph, full on off, he drives firmly but straight to cover. He picked out the fielder
length on leg stump, he clips this off the hip to fine leg
thigh high full toss, 136kph, he sits back and just bunts this down to long on
133kph, low full toss outside off, he drives firmly to long on
137kph, yorker on leg, he digs this out to long on
slower ball bouncer, he pulls this along the ground to deep forward square
125kph. low full toss outside off, he drives inside out wide of long off and calls two immediately. Carey is rapid. No issue getting back
wide yorker, 124kph, he miscues this back to the bowler
125kph, wide yorker, he shaped to try and paddle to fine leg, had to adjust and run it to short third man
drives this powerfully through cover! low full toss and he backed away and just placed this wide of the man at cover
short slower ball, he backs away and slaps this to cover
131kph, wide full toss, he clears the left leg and slices it in the air but short of deep cover-point
137kph, full on middle, he swings hard but only gets it down the ground to long on
133kph, yorker length, he just bunts this out to mid off
crunched down the ground! Attempted yorker becomes a half volley and he pounds a drive back past the stumps to the sight screen
top edge over short third man!t Tried to launch a length ball over wide long on, got a top edge and it flies over short third man and safely for four
drilled down to straight long off, Rubel is tested on the rope but he saves two
short of length on middle and rising, Tamim gets on his toes and dabs it towards short midwicket
length ball around off and middle, defended from the crease with a straight bat
length ball outside off and steered through extra cover off the back foot, Stoinis from covers puts in the chase as Warner slips at mid-off. A slide saves one run
length ball around off, dabs it towards point from the crease
length again, just outside off, Soumya hangs his bat out, gets a thick outside edge towards third man
short of length around off, jumps in the air and taps it down towards extra cover
length ball around off, taps it towards mid-off from the back foot

short of length outside off, Soumya pushes at it but the ball comes slower off the wicket. Luckily for the batsman it was well away from Warner at mid-off who puts in an ugly but effective dive to keep it to one
a touch fuller outside off this time, Tamim comes forward and drives it towards mid-off, was looking to go extra cover but doesn't middle it
pitched up further this time and pays the price as Tamim nails the drive, comes forward and sends it between the non-striker and the mid-off
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot towards covers
back of length once again, punched towards mid-off this time, no run again
a touch fuller and on the pads, Tamim fails to make full use as he misses the flick, a leg bye to short fine leg
fuller around off, stands tall and drives it firmly but finds mid-off
short of length on middle and leg, Tamim gets on the top of it and dabs it towards deep backward square leg
fuller and angling in on to the pads, no swing there as Soumya flicks it over midwicket for four
goes for the yorker again but ends up bowling a full toss on the pads, Soumya flicks it towards fine leg where Cummins slips and makes a mess of it
short of length outside off, Soumya looks to reach out for it, playing away from the body without much feet movement, gets beaten
length ball around off, driven towards the right of mid-off from the back foot
freebies! Length ball outside off, Tamim pushes at it and gets beaten but the ball swings and dips towards the right of Carey who fails to collect and concedes four byes
short of length outside off, Tamim punches it towards extra cover with a back-foot punch
a bouncer this time, well over the batsman who didn't have any problem ducking under

a Finch direct hit finds Soumya short at the bowler's end! A length ball around off, Tamim taps it towards the left of Finch at mid-on, calls for a single, is halfway down, Soumya responds a bit late but Tamim then turns back. Finch meanwhile slides to his left, his stronger hand, balances himself, sees which end to throw at and nails the direct hit to find Soumya short
another short one from Cummins, Tamim ducks under
length ball around off, looks to drive on the up, inner half of the bat and towards short midwicket
length ball around off and Shakib plays all over it, the ball goes over the stumps
taps the length ball towards extra cover and sets off for a quick single to get off the mark
a sharp bouncer aimed at the batsman, Tamim ducks under once again
length ball on middle and leg, taps it towards short midwicket for one
another short one, a bit down the leg side though, Shakib stays in his position and let it go
fuller around off, and driven firmly through covers for four
length ball around off, punches it towards covers from the front foot
flatter and quicker, angling in, taps it towards covers and hares for a quick single
fuller around off, drives it towards sweeper cover

fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point for another quick single. Khawaja throws at the keeper's end, Tamim was in and wasn't even looking at the fielder. The throw pings him on the back of his leg
length outside off, stays back and guides it towards short third man
a touch fuller on the stumps and flicked away in front of square leg for four
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it back towards the bowler
length ball around off, looks to drive on the up, mistimes it towards short midwicket, was in the air for a while as well
length ball around off, stays back and punches it towards covers, cannot find the gap though
they know Tamim has been out thrice to short balls this tournament and here's another one. The batsman is happy to duck under for the moment
length ball outside off, stays beside the line and opens the face to steer it past the point fielder for a couple, Zampa cuts it off near the deep backward point boundary
starts with a length ball down the leg, needs to be bowled again
short of length outside off, dabs it towards deep backward point for one
length ball outside off, stays beside the line and defends it towards cover-point
length ball on the leg stump, misses the flick. A polite enquiry for lbw but it pitched outside leg
length ball outside off, moves towards the ball and dabs it towards point where Maxwell charges towards the ball, fails to pick it up and slips

length ball around middle and leg, kept a bit low as well, Shakib fails to get his bat down in time and is hit near the knee roll. Coulter-Nile is not interested but Carey is and they go for the review. And as suspected, it pitched slightly outside leg and Australia lose their review
short of length on the stumps, goes for the pull but is cramped, the ball dribbles towards mid-on
a touch fuller around off, goes for the drive but cannot beat the extra cover fielder
length ball around off, looks to drop and run but the cover-point fielder was quick to the ball
length ball outside off, throws his bat at it, gets more of a toe end towards third man
length ball around off, and Shakib drives it on the up, between the stumps and the non-striker, Cummins dives across but cannot stop, two to the total
short of length outside off, some width this time to free his arms, Shakib goes up and over backward point
fuller on the leg stump, Shakib was moving towards the off side and misses the flick, gets a leg bye to fine leg. Think it pitched just outside the leg stump. Yes, way outside leg replays confirm
fuller around off, drives it gently towards covers
length ball on the stumps, punched back towards the bowler
a slower one, full around the off stump, Shakib was a touch early into the shot but does well to keep it out
a bouncer this time, hurries at the batsman, Shakib mistimes the pull towards short midwicket
fuller around off, Shakib comes forward and drives handsomely past mid-off for four, was a slower one from Coulter-Nile
short of length around off, Shakib once again cannot nail the pull as the ball dribbles towards short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, nudges it on the leg side and sets off, Carey collects and fires in the throw to Maxwell but Tamim was home
fuller and driven towards sweeper cover where Cummins slips and concedes two
fuller outside off, looks to go over extra cover, gets a thick outside edge over backward point for two more
length ball on the pads, tucks it towards midwicket for one
flatter and quicker around off, Tamim looks to push it towards covers, ends up hitting it down the wicket
length ball outside off, pushed towards cover-point
another bouncer to Shakib but this time he ducks under
short of length at the batsman who pulls it down towards deep square leg
length ball around off, looks to dab and run but almost ends up chopping on to his stumps
short of length and rising, Tamim looks to dab it towards midwicket, ends up mistiming it towards square leg
short of length around off, punches it towards extra cover who is at the edge of the 30-yard circle
length ball around off, drops it on the off side with soft hands and steals a quick single
fuller around off, goes for the drive but doesn't middle it, a single as the short third man dives to his left to make the stop
fuller on the stumps and Shakib just chips it over the bowler's head, dead-straight and long-on cannot cut it off
and again, even better, flatter and more power behind it, four more to Shakib
fuller on the pads, flicks it towards short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, moves across and works it towards deep square, scampers back for the second to bring up the 50-run stand
length ball on the pads, flicks it behind square leg for a quick single
length ball around off, defends it from the back foot
length outside off, waits for it before guiding it towards third man
another bouncer but Tamim is avoiding the pull shot, ducks under once again
this time he plays the pull but doesn't time it, another short one from Coulter-Nile, but good thing is Tamim was looking to play at down, a single to square leg
short of length around middle and off, defends it towards square leg
a slower one but full toss on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
length ball around off, dabs it behind point and sets off for one
short of length on the stumps, goes for the pull but mistimes it towards mid-on
short of length around off, a half-pull to work it in front of square
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square for one more
fuller on the stumps, and driven firmly but Warner at mid-off dives to his left to keep it to one
length ball on the pads, tucked away behind square leg to end the over with another single
short of length outside off, Tamim pulls it down towards deep midwicket for a couple
short of length on middle, turned away towards backward square leg this time
short of length outside off, steers it past the diving backward point but cannot beat third man
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
another bouncer around off, Shakib swivels and pulls it towards deep backward square leg
short of length near the rib cage, dabs it towards square leg for one more
short of length and enough width for Tamim to rock back and cut it past point on his left, beats the sweeper cover as well
length ball around off, looks to drop and run but the fielder was quick to the ball, sends back Shakib just in time
length ball around off, drops it towards point and looks to sneak in a single, an early call of no from Tamim this time around
short of length on the stumps, pulled towards backward square leg
fuller around off, mistimes it drive towards mid-off
short again, and pulled away nicely but Starc is patrolling the deep square leg boundary
flatter and quicker, drifting and sliding past the edge as he defended from the crease
full on off, he's back, no spin, he covers up and defends
flatter, and shorter on leg, a touch of spin, he works this off the pads through square leg
shorter on leg, some spin, he's back and whipping this to deep square. 100 is up to applause
full on leg, he tucks this with the turn through forward square
very full on leg, whipped through square leg to the sweeper

leading edge caught at mid off! Slower ball from Stoinis does the trick. He rolled the fingers over an off cutter, it was full on leg stump, he closed the face too soon trying to whip through the leg side, got a thick leading edge that ballooned to mid off and Warner took a simple catch
128kph, good length tailing in to middle and off, he defends from the crease
125kph, of a length, outside off, he opens the face and runs this to third man to get off the mark
off cutter slower ball, on off, he defends from the crease

nearly a run out! Smith misses the direct hit and Mushfiqur had given up! Tamim poked this to Smith's left at midwicket and ran, Mushfiqur was slow to go but there wasn't one there. Smith pounced and threw at the striker's but just missed and Mushfiqur survives
good length, leg stump though, he turns this easily behind square
drifting down leg, he sets up early to paddle sweep and flicks it fine for a couple
brilliant reverse sweep! A switch hit really from off the stumps! It was on middle, he set up early and switch hit behind point for four!
tossed up on off, he drives to mid off
lovely shape, 94kph, no turn, he pokes at it from the crease, chops a bottom edge to Carey
flat and fast, he skips out and defends with bat and pad together
sweeps from off stump, mistimes it, roping it behind square
full on middle, he whips this from middle through the leg side for a single
110kph, slower ball, very full, he drives back to the bowler, and wanders out of his crease briefly, Stoinis shies at the striker's and hits Tamim on the leg but the throw had no power
superb pull shot behind square! Slower bouncer, he picked the length, swivelled and smacked it into the gap between deep square and fine leg
slower ball outside off, he runs this to third man to bring up 50. Warm applause. A long way to go for Tamim
slower ball on middle, whipped behind square off the front foot
125kph, full on leg, he clips this neatly away behind square to the sweeper
flatter on off, he's back and punching this to long on
90kph leg break on off, he drives straight to cover
leg break tossed up higher, he drives back to the bowler, who completely misses it and allows one
looped very full on leg, he drives firmly to long on
skips down to it on the full and launches straight of long on! 91kph but too full, he was done very quickly and just eased his hands through the line
charges early and goes leg side, Zampa saw it, fired wide of off and he had to adjust and defend into the off side
full outside off, he drives to mid off who is on the circle and takes a tight but comfortable enough single
139kph, good length, middle and off, he stays back and defends from deep in the crease

another mix up. How close was this to a run out? Short ball into body, it rolls towards third man, Carey cuts it off, Mushfiqur runs and then is sent back, Carey shies and misses but it would have been out!
slices a thick edge away to third man
full outside off, driven to cover and it goes straight through Khawaja at cover, clean bowled him, Lyon has a long chance and reels it in on the rope
brutal short ball, 139kph, Mushfiqur parries it off the splice of the bat but it flies safely fine of gully to third man. He was lucky that didn't go to hand
short and wide, he hammers a cut straight to deep point
sweeps hard over square leg! He set up early stepping across his stumps, sweeping a length ball behind square, one bounce four
top spinner, full outside off, he drives to cover but Maxwell makes a nice save
flatter on middle, he's back and working this through square leg
pushed through, 93kph, on middle and off, he defends on the front foot
leg break tossed wide of off, it spins sharply wide of the guideline and is called
flatter on leg, he's back and working this behind square for a couple, good placement and running
chopped on! 146kph, good length, fourth stump line, too close to run to third man, he got it off the inside edge and it ricocheted onto the stumps! That's a massive blow.
hit on the helmet first up! He ducked straight into a rapid bumper! He seems OK. He didn't knock him down but he turned his head and was hit flush on the side of the helmet.
145kph, speared into leg stump, he sits back and clips this neatly through square leg
145kph, full outside off, he leans into a drive caressing it through cover to the sweeper
back of a length on off, he's back and defending back to Starc
145kph, shorter length, he's back and defending with an angled back, keeping it down to backward point
137kph, fuller on off, he pushes on the up, checking the shot, it lands short of cover
138kph, he drives and gets a thick edge that flies in the air but short of third man
140kph, good length outside off, he pushes away from his body, feet anchored, running it to backward point
he square drives on the rise, pushing it through point to the sweeper in the deep
135kph, back of a length, he stays leg side and defends with an open face to gully
138kph, angled down leg, he glances this neatly to fine leg
139kph, short ball, outside off, he rides the bounce and runs this to third man
143kph, short ball, he pulls around the corner to fine leg
back of a length, outside off, he squared up, trying to run to third man but Maxwell makes a good diving save
139kph, full speared into leg, he lets it come and works it behind square with control
short ball on off, he pulls this well but straight to the man in the deep at square leg
145kph, half volley and Mushfiqur executes a sublime cover drive! Just leaned forward with a lovely stride and timed it superbly
shorter length, on leg, he glances this off the hip
140kph, good length, angled into off, he defends on the front foot
142kph, good length, off stump, he gets a thick edge defending on the back foot but it runs to third man
glorious straight drive past mid on! Cross seam half volley, but he presented the full face punching it straight of mid on. Just needed to beat the man and it was four
back of a length on leg, he tucks this off the hip but straight to midwicket
a horrible error from Stoinis on the cover rope!141kph, over-pitched, he plays a lovely cover-drive, Stoinis comes around from deep point, slides and fumbles it into the rope!
full and wide of off, he caresses a drive on the up to deep cover-point
short and he cracks a pull shot over midwicket! He seized the length so quickly, was back and clattering this over midwicket
135kph, angled into the pads, he clips this neatly forward of square and they get two more
shorter 127kph, cutter outside off, but it sits up and he pulls to wide fine leg
good length, wide of off, he square cuts but straight to Maxwell who makes a save
138kph, good length on off, he's forced to defend this to cover
90kph full toss, he skips out and checks a drive back to the bowler

Given LBW!. Liton reviews after a chat with Mushfiqur. He was caught on the crease and trapped by one that slid on quickly. He went back to a good length ball but it zipped off the surface and hit him on the knee roll. No bat involved and it's not going over. Only question is whether it's sliding down leg. No it's hitting! It was 'Umpire's call' hitting enough of leg stump! Decision stands. Bangladesh keep their review.
full and wide of off, he square drives through point to the sweeper
91kph, leg break that bounces and beats him between bat and pad as he tried to whip to leg
shorter length, he's back and pulling to deep square
full outside off, drifting in, he skips out and yorks himself
132kph, good length, on off, he defends from the crease to backward point
131kph, full and wide of off, he drives on the rise through point to the man in the deep
short and angled down leg, he pulls in the air but just short of Cummins at wide fine leg
134kph, full and wide, he square drives powerfully but straight to deep point
136kph, back of a length, angled into off, he punches off the back foot straight to backward point
137kph, good length, tailing into middle and off, he's right back on his stumps, defending
ripping leg break fizzes past the outside edge as he pressed forward to defend
shorter length, he's back and working this through midwicket
tossed up leg break outside off, he plays and misses trying to drive
pushed through on middle, he's back and punching this to long on
shorter and quicker, he's back and pulling to deep square
lofted down the ground from the crease, he doesn't time it, Cummins comes around to make the save on the bounce
134kph, good length angled into off, he defends from the crease
132kph, back of a length outside off, he sits back, opens the face and runs it to third man
he charges and launches a length ball high over midwicket! Brilliant strike. He charged early, got the length he wanted and it made a sweet sound off the bat but landed just inside the rope
short ball, he pulls along the ground to the man in the deep
charges and flat bats forward of square! He got a length slower ball, he ran down and swung hard and slapped it forward of square with power
play and miss trying to cut wide of off
fuller around leg stump, Mushfiqur plays inside out towards the bowler's left
short of length outside off, cuts it towards backward point
a loopy full toss outside off, hits it straight towards the sweeper cover
short of length on the leg side, but flatter and quicker, mistimes the pull towards short fine leg
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
fuller outside off, gives himself some room and looks to go over covers, doesn't middle it but gets enough on the bat to get it over short third man, rolls towards the boundary
length ball on the pads, flicks it away towards deep square leg
short of length outside off, rises with the bounce and dabs it towards third man
short of length and angling in, Mushfiqur gets back and defends it towards cover
short of length outside off, gets on the top of the bounce and dabs it towards backward point
short but down the leg side, takes Mushfiqur's gloves on the way and beats Carey as well as Lyon at fine leg, fifty for him
short again and on the leg stumps, pulled down towards fine leg for one
short of length outside off, and Mushfiqur pounces on it, cuts it down past the point fielder for four
length around off and driven towards the left of Finch at mid-off who puts in the slide to save three for his side
fuller on the stumps, angling in, clipped towards short midwicket
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg, only a single though
length ball outside off, looks to drive on the up, gets a thick outside edge towards third man
fuller outside off, pushes it towards sweeper cover, eight from that over
length ball around off, drops it towards covers and sets off
length ball around off, no room there. Mushfiqur taps it towards point
short of length outside off, backs away and pulls it in front of square, Stoinis puts in the slide - reverse cups - running in from deep square leg
once again backs away but shows his cards too early, Cummins fires in this one full and wide outside off, Mushfiqur cannot reach there
short of length at the body this time, Mushfiqur is forced to defend this time
short of length outside off, backs away and cuts it hard but straight towards the point fielder
short of length at the batsman, gets big on Mahmudullah but he does well in the end to work it towards fine leg
length ball, angling on the pads, worked away towards deep backward square leg, Cummins cuts it off
length ball on the pads, Mahmudullah looks to glance it fine but fails to get any bat on it, a leg-bye as the ball rolls off the pads towards short fine leg
ramped over using Starc's pace to beat the third man, was a short one outside off but Mushfiqur was up to it
goes for the yorker, but it's outside off, opens the face to steer it towards point
fuller outside off, gives himself some room and looks to hit it through extra covers, misses
a full toss around off, tucked away in front of deep square leg
fuller on the stumps, drills it past the bowler but Khawaja from long-on makes the stop to keep it to two
length down the leg side, slog sweeps it towards fine leg but only a single
fuller this time, Mahmudullah makes some room but Stoinis follows him, the ball goes through between the batsman and the stumps as Mahmudullah fails to connect
fuller on the stumps, clipped away towards deep midwicket for a couple
fuller on the stumps, clipped away behind square this time, two more to the total
tossed up outside off, Mushfiqur skips down and drills it towards sweeper cover, Maxwell sprints from deep points, dives to his right to make a one-handed stop
reverse sweep this time, up and over backward point for four
flighted again, Mushfiqur comes forward and pushes it back towards the bowler
down the track and looks to go over the top, a couple of bounces towards long-on
moves across, goes down on one knee and sweeps it fine, an appeal for lbw but there was some bat involved, four more to the total
almost chops on, was a length ball around off, looks to cut it away but it's too close, into the ground
length ball down the leg side, goes for the sweep but misses, a leg bye to short fine leg
a full toss on the leg stump but this time the fine leg is back and keeps it to one
fuller outside off, backs away and slices it over cover, but only a single as the sweeper cuts it off
in the blockhole this time from Stoinis, Mahmudullah does well to get his bat down
fuller on the stumps, Mahmudullah goes deep and chips it towards deep midwicket
length ball on the stumps, Mushfiqur jumps towards the off side and looks to scoop it over, misses though
length ball around off, tossed up, Mahmudullah goes for the cut but ends up chopping it into the ground
length ball on the stumps, worked towards deep midwicket for a couple
length again, just around the off stumps, Mahmudullah skips down and lofts it over long-on, 95 metres
length ball around off and middle, flatter and quicker at 95kph, defended by Mahmudullah
slog swept over wide long-on this time, fuller around off and smoked for another six
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards extra cover for a quick single
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg for one
slower bouncer, Mushfiqur looks to help it over the slip region, misses. Bounces in front of keeper and spins further down for four, given wide as well
length ball, Cummins sees Mushfiqur backing away and bowls wide outside off, too wide deems the umpire
an offcutter on a length outside off, steered towards cover-point
fuller on the stumps, clipped away towards deep midwicket by Mahmudullah
fuller again, Mushfiqur gives himself some room and clips it away towards backward square leg
fuller and wider outside off, once again too wide. 100 of the stand comes up off just 83 balls
length ball outside off, runs it down towards third man
short of length outside off, opens the face to guide it towards third man
slower ball full toss outside off, driven through cover
back of a length, straight ball, another slower one. He shuffles across to clip to square leg
short of length and pulled towards deep backward square leg, only a single though
fuller outside off and steered past backward point for four, brings up his fifty as well, off 41 balls
a full toss and the leg stump and Mahmudullah helps it towards deep square leg boundary
length ball around off and middle, moves across and works it towards deep midwicket
length ball on the stumps, skips down the track and slaps it towards deep midwicket
a bouncer from Cummins, Mushfiqur goes for the pull but is not in control, falls well short of the deep square leg fielder
fuller outside off, stands deep and lofts it over cover-point, only a single as there is protection in the deep
short of length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it down towards third man
fuller around off and Mahmudullah has smoked it over deep midwicket, clears his front leg and frees his arms
short of length outside off, gets on his toes and works it towards midwicket for one
a slower length ball outside off, Mahmudullah skips down and swings across, misses

length ball outside off, looks to go over long-on but doesn't get the timing right, Starc was late to pick it up, dives in the end but lands well short of him and goes over, luckily not enough power behind it to reach the boundary, was a slower one from Coulter-Nile
an attempted bouncer this time, goes for the pull but ends up hitting it straight down the throat of Cummins at deep square leg
Choped on! A length ball outside off, looks to dab it towards third man but ends up playing onto his stumps, two in two for Coulter-Nile
length ball around off, moves across and gets his bat down just in time to work it towards mid-on
length ball around off, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, Mushfiqur backs away and pushes it towards extra cover
goes for the yorker but a touch too full, takes the leading edge of the bat and dribbles towards extra cover
fuller outside off, backs away and steers it towards point
short of length outside off, backs away and carves it over backward point, comes back for the second
goes for the yorker but ends up bowling a full toss at the batsman, worked away towards mid-on
fuller around off, backs away and hits straight, just over the bowler who stretches his hand but cannot reach
short of length outside off, rocks back and cuts but straight towards sweeper cover
slower one but too full at the stumps, Mushfiqur goes aerial and just clears Finch at mid-off for four
length ball down the leg side, swiped away towards deep backward square leg for a couple
fuller outside off, looks to hit it through covers but the ball hits the toe end of the bat and goes between the keeper and short third man
a slower bouncer outside off, looks to ramp it away but misses
fuller on the stumps, backs away and steers it towards point
fuller around off, opens the face of the bat to steer it towards backward point
fuller and angling in on to the pads, 145kph, Mehidy can only lob it towards mid-on where Warner takes one of the easier catches
fuller on the pads and clipped away towards square leg, moves to 99
goes for the yorker, right on the stumps, Mortaza was looking to work it on the leg side, gets an outside edge that rolls towards third man
short of length on the stumps, Mushfiqur gets behind the line and defends
and that's his hundred there, fuller on the stumps, Mushfiqur pushes it towards covers and sets off, and brings up his seventh ODI hundred
slower length ball around off, turns it away towards midwicket
slower length ball on the stumps, a wild swing but misses, the ball goes over the stumps
another slower one around off, Mashrafe goes over the bowler's head, a couple of bounces and four
fuller on the off stump, backs away and steers it towards point
a low full toss around off, pushes it towards wide long-on
length ball around off, Mashrafe looks to club it over deep midwicket but cannot clear Maxwell
